author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and applied face restoration and created a sound design for this video of New York. It captures vivid scenes of street life in Spanish Harlem during the 1940s, offering a rare and intimate glimpse into the daily rhythms, expressions, and atmosphere of this vibrant neighborhood.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 



B&W Video Source: Library of Congress, Motion Picture, Broadcasting, and Recorded Sound Division.

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

title: Street Life in New York 1940s in Color [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
